caller_intent: Mildred is seeking assistance with insurance renewal options and is open to scheduling a meeting with Joe to discuss them. She prefers flexibility in timing and location.
resolution_steps: Joe confirms Frank requested the call to discuss renewal options.
Proposes meeting at 4 PM to accommodate Mildred's schedule.
Agrees to meet at Mildred's home (address: 89) instead of the shop.
Mentions preparing paperwork for the meeting.
Confirms meeting time and location with Mildred.
knowledge_required: Location details (e.g., proximity to the Y, address 89)
summary: Joe from Alliance Insurance schedules a meeting with Mildred to discuss her insurance renewal. They agree on a 4 PM meeting at her home (address 89) after she declines the shop location. The call concludes with confirmation of the arrangement and preparation of paperwork.
